name: Makka Soup
description: Made with sweet corn, onions, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and fresh cilantro, creating a rich, aromatic base with a hint of warmth

name: Daal Soup
description: Made with lentils, onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and a variety of spices like cumin, turmeric, and garam masala.

name: Mulligatawny Soup
description: Made with lentils, vegetables, and a blend of aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and curry leaves.
